title: SOLD ----- Lot of (10) T206s w/ AB and OM backs, SL
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: SOLD ----- Lot of (10) T206s w/ AB and OM backs, SL
posts.post_content:
Dumping some dupes to make a little extra cash for the holidays. Up for sale here are ten low-grade T206 cards:

Abstein (American Beauty 350 frame back)
Bay (Southern Leaguer AND Old Mill back)
Carrigan
Kleinow (batting)
Leifield (batting)
McGann
Rossman
Rucker throwing
Schirm
Wagner (right shoulder)

A couple have some back stamps.

SOLD dlvd. via PPFF (or add 3% from regular PP)

Also have similar lots going up for T205 and T207.
PM sent, I'll take the lot!

Ugh, sorry, Jeff - you were literally beaten by a few minutes via PM. 

These did not last long.
